'''2.1.14948''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]] and [[MCD:Launcher|Dungeons]]), '''2.1.14949''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.14947''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on May 27, 2020.

== Changes ==
* Add disclaimer text about downloading the Minecraft Dungeons launcher to play the game in Dungeons page for Windows users.
